title: Tribunal and Refer a Friend are coming to OCE???

replies.body: I think your right OP we should prepare for its arrival
Hopefully we actually do get the refer a friend system in OCE one day xD

those links have alwats been there, and always not worked for us.

so annoying, i had 30+ RAFs to turn in with the old system when i transfered and didnt realize they get removed with transfer. and now new system has max 5 RAFs and much lower rewards (no RP, less IP) and i still cant get them anyway cos OCE. but hey, i now have full RAF rewards on a lvl 10 smurf on NA that i cant be %%%%ed leveling further just to show off the awesome twitch skin...

A great day indeed, praise be to Teemo!

{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}
Too many Teemos. Way too may Teemos.
